episodes.synopsis: The Israeli secret service heads to Brazil to nab Herbert Cukurs, the notorious "Hangman of Riga" responsible for the deaths of 30,000 Latvian Jews.
episodes.title: Herbert Cukurs

episodes.synopsis: In 1960, the Israeli secret service scours Buenos Aires for Adolf Eichmann, a Nazi war criminal directly culpable for the murder of 6 million Jews.
episodes.title: Adolf Eichmann

episodes.synopsis: German housewife Beate Klarsfeld and her husband hunt for Klaus Barbie, "The Butcher of Lyon" responsible for the deaths of 10,000 French Jews.
episodes.title: Klaus Barbie

episodes.synopsis: A half-century after the war, American journalists track down Erich Priebke, a former Gestapo officer responsible for one of Italy's worst atrocities.
episodes.title: Erich Priebke

episodes.synopsis: Israeli Mossad agents spend nearly 30 years tracking down notorious Nazi physician Joseph Mengele after he's indicted for mass murder in 1959.
episodes.title: Joseph Mengele

episodes.synopsis: German housewife Beate Klarsfeld and her husband set out to nab former Gestapo chief Kurt Lischka, who ordered the arrest and murder of 33,000 Jews.
episodes.title: Kurt Lischka

episodes.synopsis: A French investigator hunts for wartime villain Paul Touvier, the pro-Nazi "Hangman of Lyon" who murdered both Jews and resistance fighters.
episodes.title: Paul Touvier

episodes.synopsis: A Nazi hunter finds Franz Strangl, a war criminal responsible for the murder of 800,000 people; his arrest leads to the capture of Gustav Wagner.
episodes.title: Gustav Wagner/Franz Strangl

video.title: Nazi Hunters
video.synopsis: Chronicling eight missions, this documentary series traces how determined agents captured some of the most evil criminals the world has ever known.
